title: Emergency Remote Teaching (ERT) Project-Based Course for Elementary Online Learning Transition

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Educational Methodologies and Experience with Online Learning Tools
context.additional_context: A training course designed and implemented for elementary education field experiences during COVID-19, focusing on project-based learning in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments.

learning_goals: Learners can apply the CIPP framework for transitioning to online elementary education in emergency situations like COVID-19
Learners can successfully design smartphone-based project learning in low-tech-access environments with 80% or higher success rate
Learners can apply and evaluate ERT strategies developed through a 4-week PBL approach to actual elementary education scenarios

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
